In the question of the definitive settlement of the land boundary dispute
between Guyana and Venezuela, @CIJ_ICJ finds that it has jurisdiction to entertain the Application filed by Guyana. https://t.co/Ox6oQwaYGZ https://t.co/JjHiFN4FW8

"We urgently need the vibrant dynamism of migration to revive our shattered economies & strive for prosperity en route to an equitable & sustainable world."

-- @UNMigration's Renate Held tells the @_UNChronicle. #MigrantsDay
https://t.co/m9R94DXkrz

"The calendar will soon turn from this difficult year. But chaos has no regard for calendars.

Trials will continue. Some hardships may even grow.

Yet through all the heartache, I see seeds of hope."

-- @antonioguterres tells German Bundestag. https://t.co/39ewMZMSe4 https://t.co/tyRhoYUT87

1 in every 30 people in the 🌍 is a migrant.

Friday's #MigrantsDay is an opportunity to celebrate the millions of migrants that are integral members of the societies in which they live, and their contributions to both their home & host countries. https://t.co/e2dAYeQ2fZ https://t.co/8CAOJrN0lB

"Become your own investigator."

UN communications chief @MelissaFleming urges everyone to #PledgeToPause & take time to verify facts before sharing online. https://t.co/OqwLPvJvXM #TakeCareBeforeYouShare 

https://t.co/iDYz2WkycF

Promoting safe & orderly migration is key to our global fight against #COVID19. 

Migrants must be included in the pandemic response for the benefit of all.

Friday is #MigrantsDay. https://t.co/viD8m3RApG via @UNMigration https://t.co/j8D1qTo7NT

Friday is World #ArabicDay! Follow the UN in Arabic via @UNArabic. More about the Day here: https://t.co/AuwX7AOvea

https://t.co/1C8qBMQCgw

👩‍🔬 Scientists
👨‍⚕️ Doctors
👩‍⚕️ Nurses
👨‍🏫 Teachers
👩‍🌾 Farmers

Migrants have been at the forefront of the fight against #COVID19. 

On Friday's #MigrantsDay, join @UNmigration in thanking them for their contributions & calling for a more inclusive world. https://t.co/viD8m3RApG https://t.co/Yr2yMQzdnw

"We must ensure that migrants, irrespective of their legal status, are included in every country’s pandemic response, particularly in health and vaccination programming."

-- @antonioguterres on Friday's #MigrantsDay. https://t.co/e2dAYeyqRp https://t.co/j7Qxa1ORe5

Happy World #ArabicDay!

Spoken by more than 400 million people, the Arabic language is one of the most widely used languages in the world. It's also considered a pillar of cultural diversity. https://t.co/4P2nnXVYVL https://t.co/f7wqce3DDo

"It is not with 'vaccinationalism' that we are going to defeat #COVID19. 
It is with international cooperation."

-- @antonioguterres stresses that a vaccine must be available and affordable to everybody everywhere. https://t.co/mA5JlWpQJP https://t.co/786i3V58Qd

Nearly 800,000 people from El Salvador, Guatemala and Honduras have fled their homes since 2013 due to escalating gang violence & persecution.

More details in new joint report from @UNICEF & @Refugees: https://t.co/tVLwPkVGuY

Women & men #ServingForPeace with @UNPeacekeeping:

🇺🇳 Protect civilians
🇺🇳 Prevent the spread of violence
🇺🇳 Help achieve & maintain peace

More on the work of UN peacekeepers around the world: https://t.co/fOO1anhAJf https://t.co/UIqNavWDVL

"During this emergency, we've had to completely modify how we live. And now we know we can do it."
-- @WFP's @rraganwfp on #COVID19 as a wake-up call for #ClimateAction.

He also shares his concerns about the devastating impact of the pandemic: https://t.co/0uJyTL9C0O https://t.co/gnXbFPEwFZ

2021-2030 is the Decade of Healthy Ageing, aimed at:

➡️ changing how we think about age & ageing
➡️ empowering older people to contribute to society
➡️ proving adequate health care to older people

More from @WHO: https://t.co/jLsZ8qPb9j https://t.co/gxwPFs05zk

♻ Reduce
♻ Reuse
♻ Recycle

Take #ClimateAction by making small changes in your daily life to reduce waste. https://t.co/X0ShwftNUV #ActNow https://t.co/tr7vwuJ0ua

A new generation of desert locust swarms is threatening the livelihoods & food security of millions of people in the Horn of Africa & Yemen. 

@FAO says more funding needed to minimize the locusts' potential destruction. https://t.co/LwOtNvhvA2 https://t.co/Ai0S1ihxoh

Thanks to the emerging filmmakers at @MCTalentFactory for a new series of videos supporting our #PledgetoPause campaign.

Take a look - and help prevent the spread of misinformation amid the #COVID19 pandemic.https://t.co/uxo77PaR9U https://t.co/rSmsNPXlQU

Syria: Millions displaced, impoverished & traumatized after a decade of conflict.

#COVID19, rising food insecurity and a declining economy are further worsening humanitarian situation in the country, @UNReliefChief tells Security Council.
https://t.co/I4HjA3qvH2

😷 3 layers of fabric
🧼 washable
👄👃 covers mouth & nose

Wearing the right face mask the right way can help slow the spread of #COVID19. 

More tips from @WHO on how to #WearAMask and protect yourself & others: https://t.co/doHQ5du8cb https://t.co/vc03BkOkkS

The world's least developed countries are particularly impacted by #COVID19.

Blended finance, which combines public & private investments, will be key to help them recover from the pandemic & achieve the #GlobalGoals. 

More in new @UNCDF-@OECD report: https://t.co/WCaQpFw9Yf https://t.co/nSSr99xEvS

Young #LGBTIQ+ people are more likely to experience homelessness than their peers. 

Together, we can build a word where every young person has a safe place to call home - no matter who they are or whom they love. 
https://t.co/KeoWDio1zf via @free_equal
#endyouthhomelessness https://t.co/5vmtzzqRs9

Redefining & redesigning sport can help the world recover better from #COVID19 and support the achievement of the #GlobalGoals. 

More from @UNDESA. https://t.co/GEzvzWTe4j https://t.co/5UTyiou2Ta

Congratulations to the 2020 #YoungChamps of the Earth!

These young people are taking ambitious #ClimateAction to protect our planet. Learn more about their activities #ForNature from @UNEP: https://t.co/YrxNIaiOXv https://t.co/RgDZ12onWx

Teachers should be prioritized to receive #COVID19 vaccine, once frontline health personnel & high-risk populations are vaccinated, urges @UNICEF.

Protecting teachers from the virus will allow schools to stay open & ensure children can continue learning. https://t.co/lZcHMQjMur https://t.co/yznVKVGcqQ

Congratulations to the winners of the @WMO photo competition.

1,000+ entries showcasing ocean, climate & weather were received from all over the world.

These 13 winning photos will appear in the 2021 WMO calendar: https://t.co/hupZp3C1Yj 

https://t.co/8LZZpUs4Pf

Fruits 🥝🍍🍉 and vegetables 🥕🥦🍆 have multiple health benefits. They can strengthen the immune system & help combat malnutrition.

2021 is the International Year of Fruits and Vegetables. More from @FAO: https://t.co/Q8jZMHEsX8 https://t.co/rTxCISQVBu

Amid the climate crisis, human development means working with & not against nature.

Latest @UNDP report presents new measurement of human progress, which combines the fight against poverty & inequality with the urgent need for #ClimateAction. https://t.co/xrCPFQbLb9 #HDR2020 https://t.co/O5NA87eGD9

Preparing to supply safe & effective vaccines against #COVID19, distributing educational kits & increasing testing capacities are just some of the actions taken by the UN to help fight the pandemic. 

More examples in our latest @TwitterMoments: https://t.co/QxAL02TzTP

As @refugees marks 70 years of working for and #WithRefugees, a new virtual exhibit from the UN showcases journeys of forced displacement through the eyes of children & adults' resilient perspectives. https://t.co/svsNq8uu91 #UNHCR70 https://t.co/4OR62ZPGyD

Four women. 
One helicopter. 

Meet the women who have transported 3,000 humanitarian passengers & 60 tonnes of cargo by air with @WFP in Haiti. https://t.co/4Zo955FaQC

1.8 billion people are at increased risk of #COVID19 & other diseases due to a lack of basic water services in health care facilities. 

Adequate hand hygiene & sanitation services are critical for keeping patients & medical staff safe. https://t.co/zMNTFOgsIW via @WHO https://t.co/X1eaPmu3pn

For 70 years, our colleagues from @Refugees have been helping people forced to flee.

Today, with nearly 80M displaced around the 🌍, their work has never been more important.

You can help them provide life-saving aid & build better futures: https://t.co/bufZb25IKC #UNHCR70 https://t.co/oeGlFwHpM7

How will we recover after #COVID19? 

Will we return to old ways or will we decide together that something better is possible? 

Decide #ItsPossible https://t.co/j4SVI5nQK8 https://t.co/31DJLGyS13

The virtual reality experience #BabaYagaVR highlights the importance of forests and shows how the choices we make in our daily lives can have a big impact.

Learn more about deforestation and how you can prevent it with the #ActNow app: https://t.co/4i2kqgYQPL #ClimateAction https://t.co/yeuR8zfp4i

#VaccinesWork

Vaccines help prevent millions of deaths every year & are continuously monitored to ensure they are safe & effective.

More facts from @WHO: https://t.co/UUx1Hwm6k3 https://t.co/Qj1my65F3F

Most of the 🌏's biodiversity lies beneath our feet, which helps us to:   

🌱 grow our food
💊 develop new medicines 
🌏 fight the climate crisis

@FAO works to share knowledge & protect this precious resource. https://t.co/9JKK03JWBJ https://t.co/2cQGPQyCYD

Every year, an estimated 11.2 billion tonnes of solid waste is collected worldwide. 

Be a #ClimateAction Superhero and help save resources by recycling rather than discarding, bringing your own shopping bag and using a refillable water bottle. https://t.co/nAjeCAHlAC #ActNow https://t.co/x9eQNPCXfX

Women represent 30% of scientists globally. Yet, they're often overlooked & their expertise silenced.

We need #WomenInScience to be part of our efforts to understand, treat & respond to #COVID19. See how @UNESCO works to support them: https://t.co/thiU7P7e3r https://t.co/1NG04ig14u

"I don't want one person that I'm responsible for to be hungry."

-- @WFP Bangladesh country director @rraganwfp talks to @MelissaFleming about what motivates his hard work towards #ZeroHunger in the last episode of our podcast 'Awake At Night'. https://t.co/0uJyTKS0Ce https://t.co/BowkETFHyl

5 years after the adoption of the #ParisAgreement on climate change, world leaders showcased innovative ideas and made new #ClimateAction commitments at Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit. https://t.co/SGtdSJvfzs https://t.co/LVcX7fOSyo

Whatever you are doing to stop the spread of #COVID19 – keep it up.
Preventing the further spread of #coronavirus is a shared responsibility for us all.

🎨: @karinamuranaga https://t.co/tL9WewUQn8

From learning facts from verified online sources to raising awareness among family & friends, here are 6 ways young people can take #ClimateAction amid #COVID19. via @UNICEF

https://t.co/IZ7ThVN6Sh

The death penalty does little to serve victims or deter crime. 

170 countries have either abolished the death penalty or introduced a moratorium on its use. 

More from @UNHumanRights: https://t.co/4RfFvqhmPg #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/XnpuuQZWeE

The recovery from #COVID19 presents an opportunity to set our economies and societies on a green path in line with the #GlobalGoals. 

-- @antonioguterres at the Climate Ambition Summit https://t.co/BqfE9fCCSI #ClimateAction https://t.co/BM8xJeXX1l

Millions of people worldwide say they want to quit tobacco use, but struggle to do so, especially with the added stresses of #COVID19. 

Get the tools and resources you need to quit from @who. https://t.co/80QtwnN432 #NoTobacco https://t.co/iyukfyKo6H

Our very existence depends on water. Yet, this valuable resource is becoming increasingly scarce. 

Ahead of next year's #WorldWaterDay, @UN_Water wants to know what water means to you - now & in the future. 

Use #Water2me to join the conversation! https://t.co/3kl951CzN2 https://t.co/5JIlq71vho

Despite a significant decline in air travel, international aviation has played a unique role in the pandemic response.

Learn more, including how the aviation sector will support the efficient & equitable global distribution of #COVID19 vaccines.  https://t.co/MPn7P2rBWd

Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit has shown a new surge in #ClimateAction

75 countries and businesses, cities & civil society have discussed concrete plans and made new pledges, bringing us one step closer to meeting the goals of the #ParisAgreement. https://t.co/SGtdSJMQr0 https://t.co/DhwHd8FtT4

Global leaders joined activists, businesses & civil society at the Climate Ambition Summit to mark the 5th anniversary of the #ParisAgreement & to renew their #ClimateAction commitments.

See examples in our latest @TwitterMoments: https://t.co/hgghV8T3zU

"There is bound to be a lot of soul-searching about the future role of shared, multilateral institutions."

-- @UNReliefChief shares lessons learned from the #COVID19 response & reflects on how the pandemic may impact the future of multilateralism. https://t.co/wv2ZShXuj7 https://t.co/8EKIqxs4cK

Young people get a huge amount of their information online, where false and potentially harmful advice is prevalent. 

Share these tips for talking to children about misinformation, including helping them tell fact from fiction. 

Get verified information: https://t.co/gHw1mlod9g https://t.co/WJ2KdmfAnK

"On the path to #COP26, I urge everyone to show ambition, stop the assault on our planet -- and do what we need to guarantee the future of our children & grandchildren."

-- @antonioguterres at the Climate Ambition Summit https://t.co/BqfE9fCCSI #ClimateAction https://t.co/pU8iTkiB8b

Watch live: Global leaders meet virtually at the Climate Ambition Summit to commit to renewed and increased #ClimateAction as we mark the fifth anniversary of the #ParisAgreement.

https://t.co/WoapTJVje8

Ending the #COVID19 crisis and building a safer and healthier future requires investing in health systems that protect all people, everywhere. 

On Saturday's Universal Health Coverage Day, join @WHO in calling for #HealthForAll https://t.co/0JhGtB3XXk https://t.co/aAkkx31NvH

Donors have pledged more than $370 million to help @UNCERF deliver life-saving aid to those most in need. 

The funds will help humanitarians respond quickly & efficiently to urgent crises around the world. https://t.co/McLvFqbP4K #InvestInHumanity https://t.co/1n6PxaDe8E

Primary health care can help protect people during #COVID19 and will be critical to recover better.

More from @WHO on Saturday's Universal Health Coverage Day. https://t.co/0JhGtBlyOS #Health4All https://t.co/JVma5xhbl3

Hundreds of thousands of internally displaced Yemenis are facing food insecurity & potential famine due to the combined effects of violence & #COVID19. via @Refugees 

https://t.co/dVn3BQSocB

The UN provides impartial mediation to prevent & de-escalate conflict. 

More on Saturday's International Neutrality Day: https://t.co/J0nbpoDCD2 https://t.co/ilpE3qjW4s

#Health4All means primary health care that:
• is affordable & closer to communities 🏠
• protects against disease 🦠 
• empowers people to live healthy lives 🏃🚴

@WHO has more on Saturday's Universal Health Coverage Day: https://t.co/0JhGtB3XXk https://t.co/pgD7nGxhXO

The 5th anniversary of the historic #ParisAgreement is an important moment to renew #ClimateAction commitments to help us make the transition to a cleaner, healthier & more prosperous future for all.

More about Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit:  https://t.co/5sL0m8Wb4p https://t.co/kgdBCdIYHs

Our efforts may not always make headlines -- but for 75 years, the UN has been working to prevent conflict and keep peace & stability.

Saturday is International Neutrality Day. https://t.co/J0nbpoDCD2 #UN75 https://t.co/H15vbCjM6g

As #ParisAgreement turns 5, our planet is in no mood to celebrate.

Amid rising temperatures & extreme weather events, #ClimateAction is more urgent than ever.

The Climate Ambition Summit is a chance for renewed commitments to protect our planet. https://t.co/5sL0m8EAcR via @WMO https://t.co/VZXdJCTIRl

Happy Birthday, @UNICEF!

From responding to emergencies, to delivering life-saving vaccines, to providing educational opportunities, for 74 years, our colleagues have been working tirelessly for the well-being of children everywhere. https://t.co/DBijHFx448 #ForEveryChild

"The #COVID19 pandemic provides overwhelming evidence that we need more — and more effective — multilateralism, with vision, ambition and impact."

-- @antonioguterres' address to the Nobel Peace Prize Forum. https://t.co/frJhwO9V14 https://t.co/wkkzUKSi8E

Mountains cover more than 25% of the earth's land surface and are home to nearly 1 billion people. Yet, they are increasingly under threat due to the climate crisis.

Learn more from @FAO about why #MountainsMatter on Friday's International Mountain Day. https://t.co/xzEPmzR1Lh https://t.co/2PKTPwEIy1

#FBF to December 2015 when 197 countries adopted the #ParisAgreement to tackle the climate crisis.

On its 5th anniversary, global leaders will come together for Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit to generate renewed and increased #ClimateAction. https://t.co/aIiXru4wi8 https://t.co/CokcQMXRVS

Education is a human right, not a privilege.

As @UNESCO Convention against Discrimination in Education turns 60 this year, learn more about their work to #StandUp4HumanRights & ensure everyone's #RightToEducation. https://t.co/FXNDvSpdZB https://t.co/u7LDidPZf7

The @UNEP Champions of the Earth show the amazing potential of individual & collective #ClimateAction.

Meet the 2020 #EarthChamps and get inspired by their stories and accomplishments #ForNature.
https://t.co/O5M764qz2r

The Universal Declaration of Human Rights has helped improve the lives of millions and lay the foundations for a more just world. 

See how the UN & others celebrated Thursday's #HumanRightsDay around the world. #StandUp4HumanRights https://t.co/mIUSGZGJta

"This Nobel Peace Prize is more than a thank you. It is a call to action."

-- @WFPChief David Beasley accepted the #NobelPeacePrize on behalf of @WFP on Thursday. He warned that 270M people face starvation & are in need of urgent international support. https://t.co/xNktlX88Q8 https://t.co/Ous40RMMXR

The UN is joining people, business, cities & countries around the world in taking #ClimateAction.

In total, we offset 97% of the greenhouse gases generated in the course of our work last year. 

More in @UNEP's sustainability report: https://t.co/WpHjIpUng6

The #16Days of activism against gender-based violence wrap up on Thursday's #HumanRightsDay -- but the fight to ensure the equality & protection of women & girls continues every day.

@UN_Women explains how you can take action: https://t.co/Vlu5ZK1SHH #GenerationEquality https://t.co/K0na4UJTE8

#TBT to December 2015 when UN Messenger of Peace @leodicaprio joined global leaders at #COP21 where the historic #ParisAgreement was adopted.  

5 years later, Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit will help generate renewed and increased #ClimateAction. https://t.co/aIiXrtMVqA https://t.co/pax6NRxgbD

The freedoms enshrined in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights remain as relevant as ever, and must be at the centre of efforts to recover better from the #COVID19 pandemic. 

More on Thursday's #HumanRightsDay: https://t.co/m1atSwmkWD https://t.co/QV23BO2ePd

From reducing emissions and air pollution to decarbonizing the shipping sector, see how #ClimateAction initiatives are helping tackle the climate crisis, ahead of Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit. https://t.co/pSYbjz0W8X https://t.co/8DK3KvoCC0

Watch LIVE as our colleagues at @WFP accept the #NobelPeacePrize for their tireless efforts to achieve #ZeroHunger & improve the lives of the world's most vulnerable people.

👉 https://t.co/QV6zB3BD5b https://t.co/STocBaTjKQ

The Universal Declaration of Human Rights has helped improve the lives of millions of people and lay the foundations for a more just world.

#StandUp4HumanRights on #HumanRightsDay & every day.  https://t.co/2ftXxLBj0g https://t.co/FDd1Nx3IuU

By mid-2020, 80 million people worldwide were forcibly displaced due to persecution, conflict & human rights violations.

For many of them, #COVID19 has severely worsened the challenges they face. via @Refugees https://t.co/e0JO05fhng

"People and their rights must be front & centre of response & recovery.

We need universal, rights-based frameworks, like health coverage for all, to beat this pandemic & protect us for the future."

-- @antonioguterres on Thursday's #HumanRightsDay. https://t.co/JGN0GN4A29 https://t.co/wBkEpMeApS

As we work towards recovery from #COVID19, we must build back greener for our planet & our future.

On the 5th #ParisAgreement anniversary, world leaders are gathering to make new #ClimateAction commitments.

More on Saturday's Climate Ambition Summit: https://t.co/aIiXru4wi8 https://t.co/nqTeCWkMBz

#COVID19 has exacerbated inequalities, poverty, discrimination & other challenges.

Human rights must be at the heart of the recovery efforts worldwide.

More on Thursday's #HumanRightsDay: https://t.co/glTBF4ZrKJ https://t.co/P9ipf4eCBt

.@EduCannotWait Director @YasmineSherif1 has dedicated her life to helping children & refugees in humanitarian emergencies.

Find out what motivated her to start working for the UN at 24 and listen to her tips for young people interested in doing the same. https://t.co/9zqJUWQMPb https://t.co/oq8nDgnrJl

The pandemic has left us exposed, vulnerable & weakened. Yet, it has also provided clear insights on how we can turn disaster into an opportunity to improve our future.

--@UNHumanRights chief @mbachelet ahead of Thursday's #HumanRightsDay. https://t.co/5QZ0OvHgdO https://t.co/NrTyLGIvAM

Latest @UNEP #EmissionsGap report shows that despite a dip in CO2 emissions caused by the pandemic, the world is still heading for a temperature rise in excess of 3°C this century.

A green #COVID19 recovery is essential to close the #ClimateAction gap. https://t.co/WcMum8oH5M

Preventing genocide requires early action to protect those at risk.

More on the UN's work to #PreventGenocide on Wednesday's International Day: https://t.co/u5Ko1bTVQK https://t.co/8Sr4CBdgB3
On Wednesday's #PreventGenocide day, find out about the Genocide Convention & its role in combating and preventing the crime of genocide: https://t.co/LoeJKNNE3m https://t.co/tDaW0tWjnL

Our choices matter. 
Our actions count. 

Ahead of Saturday's #ParisAgreement anniversary & Climate Ambition Summit, use the new #ActNow @Instagram face filter to spread the word about how you are taking #ClimateAction: https://t.co/PPFdWde4Or https://t.co/PMT5clvi9k

Corruption negatively impacts everyone, everywhere - and could hamper the achievement of the #GlobalGoals & delay the #COVID19 recovery. 

Wednesday is International Anti-Corruption Day. https://t.co/0mzwCArPcF #UnitedAgainstCorruption https://t.co/GmtiIZ0zjq

"Genocide is the most heinous of crimes, encompassing all it touches in a tsunami of hate and destruction. It is an assault on our most fundamental shared values."

-- @antonioguterres on Wednesday's #PreventGenocide Day. https://t.co/DekLGooGPX https://t.co/Wh8auazrW1

Sudan: International support is critical as the country continues on path toward democratic transition amid political disagreements, economic decline & #COVID19. 

More about Tuesday's UN Security Council meeting on the country's next steps. https://t.co/YyUtJkGgKm

An inclusive recovery from #COVID19 can only be achieved with integrity through increased oversight & transparency to mitigate the risk of corruption.

More on Wednesday's International Anti-Corruption Day. https://t.co/0mzwCArPcF #UnitedAgainstCorruption https://t.co/3AVDGaqCbA

"An investment in @UNCERF is an investment in humanity."

-- @antonioguterres at high-level pledging event for global emergency response fund that supports people trapped in sudden & deteriorating crises. https://t.co/5zwfKHySTs #InvestInHumanity

"Solidarity is humanity. Solidarity is survival." -- @antonioguterres

Solidarity and kindness are key for tackling #COVID19. Find some inspiring examples in our @TwitterMoments: https://t.co/65Tb5sSBes

#COVID19 has impacted lives around the world & indigenous peoples have been hit particularly hard.

This week, a @UNDESA expert meeting will explore the pandemic's effects on indigenous populations & share solutions for recovering better. #WeAreIndigenous https://t.co/vdAcej3bYt
